document.full_text: criss-crossing venezuela armed with promises of change, opposition leaders are jostling for position to run against president hugo chavez, convinced they can end his long rule with a mix of center-left policies.
document.title: chavez foes jostle ahead of venezuela vote, move left
lines_and_colors: criss-crossing venezuela armed with promises of change, opposition leaders are jostling for position to run against president hugo chavez, convinced they can end his long rule with a mix of center-left policies.
